name: website
description: ## Document * Clone this repo: ``` git clone https://github.com/bhanushalimahesh3/node-website.git ``` * Install dependencies using [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) javascript package manager: ``` npm install ``` * Start node server with [nodemon](https://nodemon.io/): ``` nodemon start ``` * Tune to url: ``` http://localhost:3000 ```
